verses.verse: It happened in the <S%H3117>days<s%> when the <S%H8199>judges<s%> <S%H8199>judged,<s%> that there was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%> A certain <S%H376>man<s%> of Bethlehem <S%H1035>Judah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1481>live<s%> in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H802>he,<s%> and his wife, and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H458>Elimelech,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5281>Naomi,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H4248>Mahlon<s%> and <S%H3630>Chilion,<s%> <S%H673>Ephrathites<s%> of Bethlehem <S%H1035>Judah.<s%> They <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and continued there.
<S%H458>Elimelech,<s%> <S%H5281>Naomi<s%>'s <S%H376>husband,<s%> <S%H4191>died;<s%> and she was <S%H7604>left,<s%> and her <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

They <S%H5375>took<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%> of the <S%H802>women<s%> of <S%H4125>Moab;<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H6204>Orpah,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H7327>Ruth:<s%> and they <S%H3427>lived<s%> there about <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

<S%H4248>Mahlon<s%> and <S%H3630>Chilion<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and the <S%H802>woman<s%> was <S%H7604>bereaved<s%> of her <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3206>children<s%> and of her <S%H376>husband.<s%>

Then she <S%H6965>arose<s%> with her <S%H3618>daughters-in<s%>-law, that she might <S%H7725>return<s%> from the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> for she had <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> how that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6485>visited<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> in <S%H5414>giving<s%> them <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

She went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4725>place<s%> where she <S%H8147>was,<s%> and her two <S%H3618>daughters-in<s%>-law with <S%H3212>her;<s%> and they went on the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

<S%H5281>Naomi<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3618>daughters-in<s%>-law, <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H802>each<s%> of you to her <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house:<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> with <S%H6213>you,<s%> as you have dealt with the <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and with me.

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>grant<s%> you that you may <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H4496>rest,<s%> <S%H802>each<s%> of you in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of her <S%H376>husband.<s%>" Then she <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H5375>them,<s%> and they lifted up their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>
They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7725>her,<s%> "No, but we will return with you to your <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

<S%H5281>Naomi<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Go <S%H7725>back,<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> Why do you want to <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H1121>me?<s%> Do I still have sons in my <S%H4578>womb,<s%> that they may be your <S%H582>husbands?<s%>

Go <S%H7725>back,<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> your <S%H2204>way;<s%> for I am too old to have a <S%H376>husband.<s%> If I should <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3426><s%> 'I have <S%H8615>hope,<s%>' if I should even have a <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H3915>tonight,<s%> and should also <S%H3205>bear<s%> <S%H1121>sons;<s%>

would you then <S%H7663>wait<s%> until <S%H3860>they<s%> were <S%H1431>grown?<s%> Would you then <S%H5702>refrain<s%> <S%H3860>from<s%> having <S%H376>husbands?<s%> <S%H1323>No,<s%> my daughters, for it <S%H4843>grieves<s%> me <S%H3966>much<s%> for your <S%H3027>sakes,<s%> for the hand of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has gone out against <S%H3318>me.<s%>"
They lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and wept <S%H1058>again:<s%> and <S%H6204>Orpah<s%> <S%H5401>kissed<s%> her <S%H2545>mother-in<s%>-law, but Ruth joined with <S%H1692>her.<s%>

She <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2994>"Behold,<s%> your sister-in-law has gone <S%H7725>back<s%> to her <S%H5971>people,<s%> and to her <S%H430>god.<s%> <S%H7725>Follow<s%> <S%H310>your<s%> <S%H2994>sister-in<s%>-law."

Ruth <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6293>"Don't<s%> entreat me to <S%H5800>leave<s%> <S%H7725>you,<s%> and to return from following <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3212>you,<s%> for where you go, I will <S%H3212>go;<s%> and where you <S%H3885>lodge,<s%> I will <S%H3885>lodge;<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and your <S%H430>God<s%> my <S%H430>God;<s%>

where you <S%H4191>die,<s%> will I <S%H4191>die,<s%> and there will I be <S%H6912>buried.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> so to <S%H3254>me,<s%> and more <S%H4194>also,<s%> if anything but death part you and <S%H6504>me.<s%>"
When she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she was steadfastly <S%H553>minded<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H2308>her,<s%> she left off speaking to <S%H1696>her.<s%>

So they <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> until they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%> It <S%H935>happened,<s%> when they had come to <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> that all the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H1949>moved<s%> about <S%H559>them,<s%> and they asked, "Is this <S%H5281>Naomi?<s%>"

She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7121>them,<s%> "Don't call me <S%H5281>Naomi.<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> me <S%H4755>Mara;<s%> for the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> has dealt <S%H3966>very<s%> bitterly with <S%H4843>me.<s%>

I went <S%H1980>out<s%> <S%H4392>full,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has brought me home <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7387>empty;<s%> why do you <S%H7121>call<s%> me <S%H5281>Naomi,<s%> since <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6030>testified<s%> against <S%H7706>me,<s%> and the Almighty has afflicted <S%H7489>me?<s%>"

So <S%H5281>Naomi<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and Ruth the <S%H4125>Moabitess,<s%> her <S%H3618>daughter-in<s%>-law, with <S%H7725>her,<s%> who returned out of the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> in the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>
